mapper.sql:
pro_id IN (
SELECT pro_id FROM project WHERE dep_id = #{depId} AND pro_status != 5
UNION
SELECT pro_id FROM project WHERE cou_id = #{couId} AND pro_status != 5
UNION
SELECT pro_id FROM project WHERE u_id = #{uId} AND pro_status != 5
)
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(dis_invest) monthlyInvest, COUNT(dis_id) monthlyInvestCount FROM dispatch WHERE dis_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01') AND DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01')
SELECT COUNT(pro_id) projectQuantity, SUM(pro_dis_complete IS NOT NULL) completeQuantity FROM project

SELECT dis_time last_dispatching_date, pro_name, dis_invest invest FROM ( SELECT dis_time, dis_invest, pro_id FROM dispatch WHERE dis_id IN ( SELECT max_dis_id FROM ( SELECT max_dis_id FROM ( SELECT MAX(dis_id) max_dis_id FROM dispatch
GROUP BY pro_id ) AS sub1 ORDER BY max_dis_id DESC LIMIT 10 ) sub2 ) ) d LEFT JOIN project p ON p.pro_id = d.pro_id ORDER BY dis_time DESC

SELECT dis_time last_dispatching_date, pro_name, dis_invest invest FROM ( SELECT dis_time, dis_invest, pro_id FROM dispatch WHERE dis_id IN ( SELECT max_dis_id FROM ( SELECT max_dis_id FROM ( SELECT MAX(dis_id) max_dis_id FROM dispatch
GROUP BY pro_id ) AS sub1 ORDER BY max_dis_id LIMIT 10 ) sub2 ) ) d LEFT JOIN project p ON p.pro_id = d.pro_id ORDER BY dis_time

SELECT month, SUM(dis_invest) invests, COUNT(dis_id) counts FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL NUM MONTH, '%Y-%m') month FROM ( SELECT 1 AS NUM UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12 ) NUMS ) N NATURAL LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT dis_id, dis_invest, DATE_FORMAT(dis_time, '%Y-%m') month FROM dispatch WHERE dis_time > DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 12 MONTH, '%Y-%m')
) D GROUP BY month ORDER BY month

SELECT `month`, SUM(p.time < D.month AND (p.d_start IS NULL OR p.d_start > D.month)) AS not_started_quantities, SUM(p.time < D.month AND p.d_start <= D.month AND (p.complete IS NULL OR p.complete > D.month)) AS dispatching_quantities, SUM(p.time < D.month AND p.d_start IS NOT NULL AND p.complete IS NOT NULL AND p.d_start <= D.month AND p.complete <= D.month) AS completed_quantities FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL num MONTH, '%Y-%m') AS month FROM ( SELECT 1 AS num UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12 ) nums ) D CROSS JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pro_dis_start, '%Y-%m') AS d_start, DATE_FORMAT(pro_dis_complete, '%Y-%m') AS complete, DATE_FORMAT(pro_add_time, '%Y-%m') AS time FROM project
) p GROUP BY D.month
SELECT SUM(pro_status = 0) pre_report, SUM(pro_status = 2) review, SUM(pro_status = 1) normal, SUM(pro_status = 4) dispatch, SUM(pro_status = 3) unlocked, SUM(pro_status = 6) complete FROM project
